src.utility.LabelIdMapping module¶

class src.utility.LabelIdMapping.LabelIdMapping[source]¶

Bases: object

Handles category id mapping for semantic segmentation maps. It’s used as a static Singleton class

static assign_mapping(mapping)[source]¶

Assign a mapping based on a given id-set. This mapping could be a path to a csv file holding the id-set, or a tuple contaning the attributes that should be assigned to this class

Parameters:mapping – If string then it’s assumed it’s a csv file holding the mapping, otherwise a tuple

holding the values that should be assigned to the attributes id_label_map, label_id_map, respectively.

id_label_map = []¶
label_id_map = {}¶
static read_csv_mapping(path)[source]¶

Loads an idset mapping from a csv file, assuming the rows are sorted by their ids.

Parameters:path – Path to csv file
